utilities
Class debugging

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--utilities.debugging
public class debugging
extends java.lang.Object

Overview
The class debugging was created to simplify the debugging process of the UCD 2001 dispersion model. Specifically, it provides an easy way for users to ignore system errors to continue debugging certain functions.
